long_description: Sized to fit in any pack, the SOL Pocket Survival Pak includes a selection of essentials to keep you confident and prepared while spending time in the backcountry. Kit includes a small signaling mirror, emergency whistle, Spark-Lite(TM) firestarter and waterproof tinder. Additional items include 10 ft. of nylon cord plus 15 ft. of stainless steel wire to help rig shelter. Waterproof survival instructions written by survival expert Doug Ritter tell you how to use everything in the pack, and also describe basic survival skills. Waterproof carry bag keeps the SOL Pocket Survival Pak dry in wet weather.
short_description: Sized to fit in any pack, the SOL Pocket Survival Pak includes a selection of essentials to keep you confident and prepared while spending time in the backcountry.
